subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Steve Johnson, a Southern California senior, won his second straight N.C.A.A. men’s singles title by beating Kentucky’s Eric Quigley, 6-4, 6-4, in Athens, Ga.
snippet: Steve Johnson, a Southern California senior, won his second straight N.C.A.A. men’s singles title by beating Kentucky’s Eric Quigley, 6-4, 6-4, in Athens, Ga.
